00038       function                _load_packages_list( $ROOT_DIR = INSTALL_DIR )
00039       {
00040             try
00041             {
00042                   $File = _file_get_contents( $ROOT_DIR.'/packages/core/data/package_list' );
00043                   if( $File === false )
00044                   {
00045                         throw( 
00046                               new Exception( 'An error occured while loading file '.$ROOT_DIR.'/packages/core/data/package_list' )
00047                         );
00048                   }
00049             
00050                   $File = str_replace( "\r" , "\n" , $File );
00051                   $File = str_replace( "\n\n" , "\n" , $File );
00052                   $PackagesInfo = explode( "\n" , $File );
00053                   
00054                   $PackageList = array();
00055                   
00056                   foreach( $PackagesInfo as $pi )
00057                   {
00058                         $PackageList [] = explode( '#' , $pi );
00059                   }
00060                   
00061                   return( $PackageList );
00062             }
00063             catch( Exception $e )
00064             {
00065                   $Args = func_get_args();throw( _get_exception_object( __FUNCTION__ , $Args , $e ) );
00066             }
00067       }

00097       function                _get_name_and_version( $RootPackage = '' , $RootVersion = '' )
00098       {
00099             try
00100             {
00101                   if( $RootPackage == '' )
00102                   {
00103                         $PackageNamePrefix = '';
00104                   }
00105                   else
00106                   {
00107                         $PackageNamePrefix = $RootPackage.'::';
00108                   }
00109                   
00110                   if( $RootVersion == '' )
00111                   {
00112                         $PackageVersionPrefix = '';
00113                   }
00114                   else
00115                   {
00116                         $PackageVersionPrefix = $RootVersion.'::';
00117                   }
00118                   
00119                   return( array( $PackageNamePrefix , $PackageVersionPrefix ) );
00120             }
00121             catch( Exception $e )
00122             {
00123                   $Args = func_get_args();throw( _get_exception_object( __FUNCTION__ , $Args , $e ) );
00124             }
00125       }

00165       function                _fetch_subpackages_list( $RetArray , $ROOT_DIR , $p ,  $PackageNamePrefix , $PackageVersionPrefix )
00166       {
00167             try
00168             {
00169                   $InfoParts = explode( '.' , $p[ 0 ] );
00170                   $RetArray [] = array( 
00171                         'package_name' => $PackageNamePrefix.$InfoParts[ 0 ] , 
00172                         'package_version' => $PackageVersionPrefix.$InfoParts[ 1 ].'.'.$InfoParts[ 2 ].'.'.$InfoParts[ 3 ]
00173                   );
00174                   
00175                   if( file_exists( $ROOT_DIR.'/packages/'.$p[ 1 ].'/packages/core/data/package_list' ) )
00176                   {
00177                         $Name = $PackageNamePrefix.$InfoParts[ 0 ];
00178                         $Version = $PackageVersionPrefix.$InfoParts[ 1 ].'.'.$InfoParts[ 2 ].'.'.$InfoParts[ 3 ];
00179                         $RetArray = array_merge( 
00180                               $RetArray , _get_packages_list( $ROOT_DIR.'/packages/'.$p[ 1 ] , $Name , $Version )
00181                         );
00182                   }
00183                   
00184                   return( $RetArray );
00185             }
00186             catch( Exception $e )
00187             {
00188                   $Args = func_get_args();throw( _get_exception_object( __FUNCTION__ , $Args , $e ) );
00189             }
00190       }

00222       function                _get_packages_list( $ROOT_DIR = INSTALL_DIR , $RootPackage = '' , $RootVersion = '' )
00223       {
00224             try
00225             {
00226                   $PackageList = _load_packages_list( $ROOT_DIR );
00227                   
00228                   list( $PackageNamePrefix , $PackageVersionPrefix ) = _get_name_and_version( $RootPackage , $RootVersion );
00229                   
00230                   $RetArray = array();
00231                   
00232                   foreach( $PackageList as $p )
00233                   {
00234                         $RetArray = _fetch_subpackages_list( 
00235                               $RetArray , $ROOT_DIR , $p ,  $PackageNamePrefix , $PackageVersionPrefix
00236                         );
00237                   }
00238                   
00239                   return( $RetArray );
00240             }
00241             catch( Exception $e )
00242             {
00243                   $Args = func_get_args();throw( _get_exception_object( __FUNCTION__ , $Args , $e ) );
00244             }
00245       }

00285       function                _fetch_subpackages_tree( $RetArray , $ROOT_DIR , $p ,  $PackageNamePrefix , $PackageVersionPrefix )
00286       {
00287             try
00288             {
00289                   $InfoParts = explode( '.' , $p[ 0 ] );
00290                   $SubPackages = array();
00291             
00292                   if( file_exists( $ROOT_DIR.'/packages/'.$p[ 1 ].'/packages/core/data/package_list' ) )
00293                   {
00294                         $Name = $PackageNamePrefix.$InfoParts[ 0 ];
00295                         $Version = $PackageVersionPrefix.$InfoParts[ 1 ].'.'.$InfoParts[ 2 ].'.'.$InfoParts[ 3 ];
00296                         $SubPackages = _get_packages_tree( $ROOT_DIR.'/packages/'.$p[ 1 ] , $Name , $Version );
00297                   }
00298                   
00299                   $RetArray [] = array( 
00300                         'package_signature' => $p[ 0 ] , 
00301                         'package_name' => $InfoParts[ 0 ] , 
00302                         'package_version' => $InfoParts[ 1 ].'.'.$InfoParts[ 2 ].'.'.$InfoParts[ 3 ] , 
00303                         'subpackages' => $SubPackages , 
00304                         'full_package_name' => $PackageNamePrefix.$InfoParts[ 0 ] , 
00305                         'full_package_version' => $PackageVersionPrefix.$InfoParts[ 1 ].'.'.$InfoParts[ 2 ].'.'.
00306                                                               $InfoParts[ 3 ]
00307                   );
00308                   return( $RetArray );
00309             }
00310             catch( Exception $e )
00311             {
00312                   $Args = func_get_args();throw( _get_exception_object( __FUNCTION__ , $Args , $e ) );
00313             }
00314       }

00346       function                _get_packages_tree( $ROOT_DIR = INSTALL_DIR , $RootPackage = '' , $RootVersion = '' )
00347       {
00348             try
00349             {
00350                   $PackageList = _load_packages_list( $ROOT_DIR );
00351                   
00352                   list( $PackageNamePrefix , $PackageVersionPrefix ) = _get_name_and_version( $RootPackage , $RootVersion );
00353                   
00354                   $RetArray = array();
00355                   
00356                   foreach( $PackageList as $p )
00357                   {
00358                         $RetArray = _fetch_subpackages_tree( 
00359                               $RetArray , $ROOT_DIR , $p ,  $PackageNamePrefix , $PackageVersionPrefix
00360                         );
00361                         
00362                         rsort_by_field( $RetArray , 'package_signature' );
00363                   }
00364                   
00365                   return( $RetArray );
00366             }
00367             catch( Exception $e )
00368             {
00369                   $Args = func_get_args();throw( _get_exception_object( __FUNCTION__ , $Args , $e ) );
00370             }
00371       }

00399       function                _install_package( $FileSource , $ROOT_DIR = INSTALL_DIR )
00400       {
00401             try
00402             {
00403                   $FileSource = strtolower( $FileSource );
00404                   $SubDirPath = md5( date( 'YmdHis' ).$FileSource );
00405                   mkdir( $ROOT_DIR.'/packages/'.$SubDirPath );
00406                   $Zip = new ZipArchive;
00407                   if( $Zip->open( $FileSource ) === false )
00408                   {
00409                         throw( new Exception( 'An error occured while opening package '.$FileSource ) );
00410                   }
00411                   if( $Zip->extractTo( $ROOT_DIR.'/packages/'.$SubDirPath.'/' ) === false )
00412                   {
00413                         throw( new Exception( 'An error occured while extracting package '.$FileSource ) );
00414                   }
00415                   @unlink( $FileSource );
00416                   $PackageList = _file_get_contents( $ROOT_DIR.'/packages/core/data/package_list' );
00417                   file_put_contents( 
00418                         $ROOT_DIR.'/packages/core/data/package_list' , 
00419                         basename( $FileSource , '.zip' ).'#'.$SubDirPath."\r\n".$PackageList
00420                   );
00421                   $Zip->close();
00422                   
00423                   return( $ROOT_DIR.'/packages/'.$SubDirPath );
00424             }
00425             catch( Exception $e )
00426             {
00427                   $Args = func_get_args();throw( _get_exception_object( __FUNCTION__ , $Args , $e ) );
00428             }
00429       }

00461       function                _get_packages_info( $PackageName , $PackageVersion , $ROOT_DIR = INSTALL_DIR )
00462       {
00463             try
00464             {
00465                   $File = _file_get_contents( $ROOT_DIR.'/packages/core/data/package_list' );
00466                   
00467                   if( $File === false )
00468                   {
00469                         throw( 
00470                               new Exception( 'An error occured while loading file '.$ROOT_DIR.'/packages/core/data/package_list' )
00471                         );
00472                   }
00473                   
00474                   $File = str_replace( "\r" , "\n" , $File );
00475                   $File = str_replace( "\n\n" , "\n" , $File );
00476                   
00477                   return( explode( "\n" , $File ) );
00478             }
00479             catch( Exception $e )
00480             {
00481                   $Args = func_get_args();throw( _get_exception_object( __FUNCTION__ , $Args , $e ) );
00482             }
00483       }

00511       function                _delete_package( $PackageName , $PackageVersion , $ROOT_DIR = INSTALL_DIR )
00512       {
00513             try
00514             {
00515                   global            $PackageCache;
00516                   $PackageCache = array();
00517                   
00518                   $Handle = fopen( $ROOT_DIR.'/packages/core/data/package_list' , 'w' );
00519                   if( $Handle === false )
00520                   {
00521                         throw( new Exception( 'Unable to open package list' ) );
00522                   }
00523                   
00524                   $PackagesInfo = _get_packages_info( $PackageName , $PackageVersion , $ROOT_DIR );
00525                   
00526                   foreach( $PackagesInfo as $pi )
00527                   {
00528                         $PackageNameAndVersion = explode( '#' , $pi );
00529                         if( $PackageNameAndVersion[ 0 ] === $PackageName.'.'.$PackageVersion )
00530                         {
00531                               _rmdir_recurse( $ROOT_DIR.'/packages/'.$PackageNameAndVersion[ 1 ] );
00532                               @rmdir( $ROOT_DIR.'/packages/'.$PackageNameAndVersion[ 1 ] );
00533                         }
00534                         else
00535                         {
00536                               $pi .= "\r\n";
00537                               fwrite( $Handle , $pi , strlen( $pi ) );
00538                         }
00539                   }
00540                   fclose( $Handle );
00541             }
00542             catch( Exception $e )
00543             {
00544                   $Args = func_get_args();throw( _get_exception_object( __FUNCTION__ , $Args , $e ) );
00545             }
00546       }
